name: Bombthrow
description:
Juggle bombs and platform through obstacles to reach the end. The bomb's explosion is inevitable, but you can manipulate when it happens to your advantage.

This was made for Ludum Dare, and it's my first time participating =). Wish I had had more time to add levels, but I'm still pretty happy with how this ended up.

Font by somepx: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free
